ygData.subject: Re: Bardic guild on Tunare
ygData.msgSnippet: Hm.. could it be that you get invited because you re 40th level?   I m only level 10 right now. hehe. Some friends of mine recently started a guild on
ygData.messageBody:
Hm.. could it be that you get invited because you're 40th level? <grin> I'm
only level 10 right now. hehe.
Some friends of mine recently started a guild on Tunare (Crimson Warriors),
and I'd join, but the name just strikes me as cheesy. :) Ah well, I'll
probably end up joining anyway. :)

One thing about being a bard.. people seem to be very nice to you, for some
reason. A dwarf warrior gave me a small bronze cloak, and someone else gave
me a Mithril Quill, both while I was just hanging out near the bank in
Freeport waiting for someone. Others have giving me things, or 'traded'
things as well, where it was obvious I was getting the better end of things.
I hope this continues into the future. :) Maybe someone will be nice enough
to give me some lambent armor. <wink, wink, nudge, nudge>

Gaelaian
Bard of the 10th Refrain, Tunare

> I play on Tunare , and it is true there aren't many events on the server.
But
> I do get invited into guilds all the time. Just group with someone, ask
them
> how they like their guild. Just start a casual conversation with them
while
> grouping. If you are a good bard , and they like how you do things. you'll
> get invited . Usually at the end of the night i'll get a tell from someone
i
> don't even know ( the leader of the guild ) asking me to join. Many of the
> guilds are well established so they don't actively go out and recruit ,
but
> that doesn't mean they won't take more members. and besides every guild
needs
> as many bards as they can get ) BtW feel free to look me up on Tunare if
you
> ever need help or anything.
>
> Ulaien Firesong
> Lvl 40 bard of tunare
